xCoord: 5, returns x coordingate in percentage of the screen width. 0 is the left edge of the image, 100 is the right edge of the image.
yCoord: 5, returns y coordingate in percentage of the screen width. 0 is the top edge of the image, 100 is the bottom edge of the image.
icon: enum: plus, plus-filled, magnify, tag, flag, image, location, expand
